headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.googletagmanager.com https://*.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data: https://*.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://www.googletagmanager.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com https://*.googleusercontent.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.google-analytics.com https://*.googletagmanager.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://*.google.com https://www.youtube.com;
